DOC.HEADLINE: 11 TIBETAN NUNS JAILED , GROUP SAYS
DOC.TEXT: Eleven Tibetan Buddhist nuns have been sentenced to prison_terms ranging from two to seven years , apparently for attempting a protest , Amnesty International said Friday . The international human_rights group said the nuns , arrested June 14 , were taken_to Drapchi prison outside Lhasa , which holds Tibet ' s most serious political_prisoners .
